chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Representable: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
RepresentableAlternate: forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B
RepresentableHelp: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
Representable_ext: forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A

Goal:
forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (impH A B) -> SysPrf NN (impH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))

Premises:
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
Trying to mask the absolute name "RepresentableHelp"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
iffH = fol.iffH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensembles.Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
addExists = fix addExists (m n : nat) (f : Formula) {struct n} : Formula := match n with | 0 => f | S n' => existH (n' + m) (addExists m n' f) end : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments addExists (_ _)%nat_scope
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
impH = fol.impH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : n
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Prop]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]

snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula ->...-> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A |- Type]
expressible.RepresentableAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f B
expressible.Representable_ext : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n g A
RepresentableHalf2Alternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (impH A B) -> RepresentableHalf2 T n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 T n f B
RepresentableHalf1Alternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (impH A B) -> RepresentableHalf1 T n f B -> RepresentableHalf1 T n f A
RepresentableHalfHelp : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), RepresentableHalf1 T n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A
expressibleAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> ExpressibleHelp T n R A -> ExpressibleHelp T n R B
freeVarAddExists1 : forall (n m v : nat) (A : Formula), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (addExists m n A)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN A)
VectorDef.t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Type), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
boundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf NN (impH (LT (var x) (natToTerm m)) a)
expressible.RepresentableHelp : System -> forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
freeVarAddExists2 : forall (n m v : nat) (A : Formula), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (addExists m n A)) -> n + m <= v \/ v < m
Representable2Expressible : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> SysPrf T (notH (equal (natToTerm 1) (natToTerm 0))) -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A : Formula), expressible.Representable T n (charFunction n R) A -> Expressible T n R (substituteFormula LNN A 0 (natToTerm 1))
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
impTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)

```coq
intros n m A B H.
rewrite <- (addExists_ext m n A).
rewrite <- (addExists_ext m n B).
apply impE.
apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros n m A B H. rewrite <- (addExists_ext m n A). rewrite <- (addExists_ext m n B). apply impE. apply H.
